scripts.prepare-biswap-bsc: cp subgraph.biswap.yaml subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare-sushiswap-mainnet: cp subgraph.mainnet.yaml subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.deploy-sushiswap-mainnet: npm run prepare-sushiswap-mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ gvladika/simplefi-sushiswap-farms
scripts.deploy-biswap-bsc: npm run prepare-biswap-bsc && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ gvladika/simplefi-biswap-farms-bsc
